One of the inputs to this Max & Min function does not originate at the dynamic input front panel terminal

A Max & Min function lies along the path between a dynamic input front panel terminal and the dynamic output front panel terminal. Both the x and y terminals of the Max & Min function must be some modification of the original data in the dynamic control.

This error occurs when either the data coming into one of the inputs of the Max & Min function originates at a different source or the data passes through a function that does not guarantee run-time type preservation.

To correct this error, verify the source of the data and ensure that any functions that the data passes through preserve the run-time type.
